name: count blinks
count repetitions
link to instructions and latest version of this flow
CSS Buttons
format:
<style>
  .filled { 
      height: 100% !important;

      padding: 0 !important;
      margin: 0 !important;
  }
  .nr-dashboard-template {
      padding: 0;
      margin: 0;
  }
  
  .rounded {
  border-radius: 12px 12px 12px 12px;
}
 
   .bigfont {
  font-size: 18px;
}

   .smallfont {
  font-size: 12px;
}
  
</style>

<script>
$('.vibrate').on('click', function() {
  navigator.vibrate(100);
});

function restore_bg(x) {
            $(this).css("background-color", x);
    };

$('.touched').on('mousedown', function() {
    
    var x= $(this).css("background-color");
    $(this).css("background-color", "yellow");
    
    setTimeout(restore_bg.bind(this,x),100);
    navigator.vibrate(80);
    });
    
</script>

name: VPN ON
format:
<md-button class="vibrate filled touched smallfont rounded" style="background-color:#c0392b" ng-click="send({payload: '1'})"> 
    VPN ON
</md-button>

name: VPN OFF
format:
<md-button class="vibrate filled touched smallfont rounded" style="background-color:#27ae60" ng-click="send({payload: '1'})"> 
    VPN OFF
</md-button>

name: Refresh
format:
<md-button class="vibrate filled touched smallfont rounded" style="background-color:#E2D96E" ng-click="send({payload: '1'})"> 
    REFRESH
</md-button>

name: Incline +
format:
<md-button class="vibrate filled touched smallfont rounded" style="background-color:#c0392b" ng-click="send({payload: '1'})"> 
    INCLINE +
</md-button>

name: CSS Buttons
format:
<style>
  .filled { 
      height: 100% !important;

      padding: 0 !important;
      margin: 0 !important;
  }
  .nr-dashboard-template {
      padding: 0;
      margin: 0;
  }
  
  .rounded {
  border-radius: 12px 12px 12px 12px;
}
 
   .bigfont {
  font-size: 18px;
}

   .smallfont {
  font-size: 12px;
}
  
</style>

<script>
$('.vibrate').on('click', function() {
  navigator.vibrate(100);
});

function restore_bg(x) {
            $(this).css("background-color", x);
    };

$('.touched').on('mousedown', function() {
    
    var x= $(this).css("background-color");
    $(this).css("background-color", "yellow");
    
    setTimeout(restore_bg.bind(this,x),100);
    navigator.vibrate(80);
    });
    
</script>

name: STOP
format:
<md-button class="vibrate filled touched smallfont rounded" style="background-color:#27ae60" ng-click="send({payload: '0'})"> 
    STOP
</md-button>

name: Incline -
format:
<md-button class="vibrate filled touched smallfont rounded" style="background-color:#c0392b" ng-click="send({payload: '-1'})"> 
    INCLINE-
</md-button>

name: OFF
format:
<md-button class="vibrate filled touched smallfont rounded" style="background-color:#27ae60" ng-click="send({payload: '0'})"> 
    OFF
</md-button>

name: Delay to set direction relay before turning Incline motor on
ON
format:
<md-button class="vibrate filled touched smallfont rounded" style="background-color:#c0392b" ng-click="send({payload: '1'})"> 
    ON/SET
</md-button>
